Name: Imaginaria
About the game: 'Imaginaria' is a term describing both a night watch and the night watcher. You are in charge of Imaginaria duty tonight, in this godforsaken Antarctic station. Inspired by the developerâ€™s experiences living in Antarctica for 15 months, Imaginaria is equal parts visual novel, point & click adventure, walking sim and documentary. FEATURES: Beautiful low-res pixel art graphics 15+ locations to explore First-hand account of life in an Antarctic station
